Common.roleplayStopped: Admins issued all players to stop all roleplay.
Common.title: Title
Common.supportedImages: See supported image types and URLs

Errors.nameAlreadyTaken: A citizen with that full name is already in use.
Errors.whitelistPending: This account is still pending access to the CAD.
Errors.whitelistDeclined: This account was declined access to the CAD.
Errors.passwordIncorrect: The password you entered was not correct.
Errors.userAlreadyExists: A user with that username already exists.
Errors.notFound: The requested item was not found.
Errors.plateAlreadyInUse: That plate is already being used on a vehicle.
Errors.invalidImageType: Only types image/png, image/jpeg, image/jpg and image/gif are supported
Errors.userBanned: This account is banned from this CAD.
Errors.userDeleted: This account has been deleted from this CAD.
Errors.alreadyInThisBusiness: You are already an employee at this business.
Errors.maxBusinessesLength: You have reached the maximum limit of businesses per citizen.
Errors.dateLargerThanNow: Please provide a date smaller than the current date.
Errors.divisionNotInDepartment: This division does not exist in this department.
Errors.selectImageFirst: You must first select an image.
Errors.officerIsCombined: This officer is marked as combined unit and cannot be used individually right now.
Errors.officerAlreadyMerged: This unit is already marked as a combined unit.
Errors.discordNameInUse: Could not create a new account with Discord since the username is already in-use.
Errors.discordAccountAlreadyLinked: This Discord account is already linked to another account.
Errors.cannotRegisterFirstWithDiscord: The first account must be registered without Discord. You can link Discord once the account is created.
Errors.invalidRegistrationCode: The registration code you provided is invalid.
Errors.unitSuspended: This unit is suspended. Please contact your supervisor.
Errors.recordOrWarrantAlreadyLinked: A record or a warrant has already been requested. Please remove the already requested record/warrant.
Errors.businessIsPending: This business is still awaiting approval to be used. Try again later
Errors.businessCreatedButPending: The business has been created successfully but is still awaiting approval to be used. It must be approved by an administrator.
Errors.maxDivisionsReached: This officer reached the maximum limit of divisions per officer.
Errors.maxLimitOfficersPerUserReached: This user reached the maximum limit of officers.
Errors.maxCitizensPerUserReached: This user reached the maximum limit of citizens.
Errors.discordIdInUse: This discord ID is already connected to a different account.
Errors.Error: An unexpected error occurred. Please report this issue to an administrator or try again later.
Errors.NOT_FOUND: The requested item or page was not found. Please try refreshing the page or try again later.
Errors.Network Error:
Could not reach the API due to a network error. Make sure that the API is online and that you are connected to the internet.

Client URL: {clientURL}

API URL: {apiURL}

Current URL: {currentURL}
Errors.mustSetBotTokenGuildId: This feature cannot be used because there was no `BOT_TOKEN` or `GUILD_ID` present. Please read how to enable Discord Roles: https://docs.snailycad.org/docs/discord-integration/discord-roles
Errors.maxDepartmentsReachedPerUser: You've reached the max set of units with this department. Please choose a different department or try again later.
Errors.allowRegularLoginIsDisabled: Regular login is disabled. Please use Discord OAuth instead
Errors.Invalid Permissions: You don't have permissions to access this API Route.
Errors.alreadyPendingNameChange: This citizen already has a pending name change request.
Errors.nameChangeRequestNotNew: To create a name change request, the new name cannot match the previous name.
Errors.socketErrorInfo: Connection to the API has been disconnected. Please re-connect to the internet or reload the browser window.
Errors.fine_invalidDataReceived: Invalid fines data received. Min: {min}, max: {max}
Errors.jailTime_invalidDataReceived: Invalid jail time data received. Min: {min}, max: {max}
Errors.bail_invalidDataReceived: Invalid bail data received. Min: {min}, max: {max}
Errors.unitCallsignInUse: This full callsign is already in-use by another unit. Please specify another callsign.
Errors.steamNameInUse: Could not create a new account with Steam since the username is already in-use.
Errors.steamAccountAlreadyLinked: This Steam account is already linked to another account.
Errors.cannotRegisterFirstWithSteam: The first account must be registered without Steam. You can link Steam once the account is created.
Errors.Unauthorized: You have been logged out. Please log back in to continue.
Errors.captchaRequired: An error occurred trying to validate your CAPTCHA. Please try again later.
Errors.invalidCaptcha: We were unable to verify you are a human. Please contact an administrator if you think this is an error.
Errors.updateAvailableInfo: A new update is available. Please update your SnailyCAD to take advantage of the latest features and bug fixes. Click for more information.
Errors.serialNumberInUse: Serial Number is already in use.
Errors.vinNumberInUse: VIN Number is already in use.
Errors.alreadyHasPrimaryUnit: This call already has a primary unit.
Errors.noActiveOfficer: You don't have any active officer at this moment, please get back on-duty first.
Errors.socialSecurityNumberTaken: This social security number is already in use.
Errors.citizenNotAllowedToEditLicenses: You as a citizen are not allowed to edit your own licenses. Please contact an officer to manage your licenses.
Errors.vehicleIsImpounded: This vehicle is impounded, you cannot edit or delete until it's released from the impound lot.
Errors.errorUploadingImage: Unable to upload your image at this moment. Please try again later. If this keeps reoccurring, contact the CAD-owner.
Errors.noDefaultDepartmentSet: There is no default department set. Please contact an administrator to set a default department.
